hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (DOGE/PEPE) 1-Hour Parabolic Sell-Off Snapback
hypothesis_content.statement: For high-sentiment meme coins (DOGE, PEPE) during BULL regimes, a rapid 1-hour price drop of >15% on elevated volume (>150% of 20-period average) will be followed by a snapback rally of at least 50% of the drop within the next 3 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In strong bull markets, meme coins are driven by retail FOMO and leveraged positions. A violent, high-volume liquidation flush often exhausts immediate sellers. Aggressive dip-buying from retail and quick-mean-reversion algos frequently creates a sharp, albeit partial, rebound.
entry_conditions: 1H candle closes down >15% from previous candle's high
Enter long at the close of the large down candle

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price recovers 50% of the drop (from entry price to the high before the drop)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: The snapback (50% retracement) occurs in less than 45% of cases, or the average loss from stop-hits significantly outweighs the average gain from take-profits.
